page.title: 02Leisure in Knypersley.
page.content: Sport recreation is extremely well catered for in this area.Knypersley Sports Club offers cricket,football, tennis,bowls and fishing.There are also several local riding schools which encourage anyone to participate in the events. The public houses provide an alternative form of recreation.People can meet in an informal atmosphere to simply enjoy each others company or play darts and pool. Squash is played at "Spots" Sports Club.The High School also has tennis courts, an all weather pitch and extensive playing fields used for athletics, rugby and football. Greenway Bank is a conservation area where a country stroll is exhilerating. It has a pool which is used for fishing and wildlife thrives there.
